player_choices.text: I need to talk to you.

elisa_night_raid.npc_text: He's... out. Drinking away our savings again. What do you want at this hour?

player_choices.text: Ben refuses to pay. You're going to cover his debt. Open your pockets.

elisa_scared.npc_text: I... I don't have any money! Please!

player_choices.text: That locket looks valuable. Hand it over.

elisa_locket_confrontation.npc_text: The... the locket? That was my grandmother's! You can't have it!

player_choices.text: Give it to me, or I'll tell Finn you're holding out.
It's for the debt. Hand it over.

elisa_give_locket.npc_text: No! It's my grandmother's! ... Okay! Take it! Just don't hurt me!

elisa_give_locket_force.npc_text: No! Get out! (She grabs a pitchfork)
